title: NEW SHOW: O.C. Swingers
description:
We’re dropping in your feed again today to share some exciting news! Audiochuck has teamed up with well-known journalist and podcaster Justine Harman for audiochuck’s newest 10-part series, O.C. Swingers! When Newport Beach Orthopedic surgeon Dr. Grant Robicheaux and his fresh-faced girlfriend are accused of drugging and raping many women, the attractive young couple claims the prosecution simply has a problem with their party lifestyle. But you can’t spell “lifestyle” without “lies”.

You can listen to the first TWO episodes right now, and be sure to follow O.C. Swingers for a new episode every Monday.

For episode information and sources, please visit https://www.ocswingers.com
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
